text: The Pakistan National Field Hockey Team also known as the Green Shirts represent the Pakistan Hockey Federation (PHF) in international field hockey competitions. Field Hockey is the National sport of Pakistan. Pakistan has been one of the most successful teams in international competitions, having won a world record four Hockey World Cup titles. ==Provincial Teams of Pakistan== * Baloch Lions * Capital Dynamos (Islamabad) * Frontier Falcons * Northern Cavaliers (Gilgit Baltistan) * Shan-e-Punjab * Sindh Qalanders Category:National sports teams of Pakistan Category:Field hockey
title: Pakistan national field hockey team
